body: I just read this dudes other works.... And theyre all connected. Bro i legit had "kanye west wolves intro" moment when i saw chairman in the other books. So good.
Phenomenal. I could unironically read this with just chairmens different facial expressions and details to her hair. Good stuff

@saitan69 there's a series named "Yarareru Mae Ni Yare" (the same artist like this series) who hasn't translated yet. The series mostly told about a story between the head of literature club & her deputy. Can you commissioned the translation of this series to HMC too, pls?
This also needs to get animated

@ThatDudePirate
Great job on the translation. Btw, I was the one who commissioned the translation from HMC xD. With the most recent release of another book from this artist, I was looking towards switching my commission request, instead of finishing the current one. Most likely it will come out in batches of 3 chapters, over the course of a year for the whole thing, and wanted to know if you were already planning to translate it, before I go ahead with the commission. Let me know, and keep up the good work ^^
Does the tomboy at the last part have another story?
Damn this good, reminds me of veteran vanilla H-manga i used to read before trapping up in viscous cycle of NTR
rape chapter aside, I actually enjoyed the story tbh.
1st one was awesome. the later one is trash
@Dantz not what u ment probs but u can wrap it so it is relitivly flat they did that in the archery class in my old uni
I don't care how tightly she wraps those sweater puppies, you can't magically turn DD's into a flat chest.  That trope always annoys the shit out of me.
